| HistoryText             = 
===Overview===
The '''United Council''' of Tribes was created by the leaders of various tribes who wanted peace for all [[Pangea (Savage Land)|Pangea]] in the [[Savage Land]].{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 4 1}}

===Events===
Seven hundred years ago, the [[Zebra People]] sent a petition out to the four corners of Pangea calling for a council of tribes that would unite them as one race. For seven hundred years the was ignored.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 4 2}}

[[Arwandi (Earth-616)|Arwandi]] of the Zebra-People was finally able to bring together a number of tribes. The meeting to interrupted by [[Torran (Earth-616)|Torran]] of the [[Ethereals (Savage Land)|Ethereals]].{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 4 1}}
